website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced block that works well for carving and serving meat or cheese.
pros: With 1.2 inches of thickness, this board works great for light-duty carving and cutting needs in a home kitchen
Consists of bamboo, which naturally has anti-bacterial properties
Juice groove catches drippings while cutting food
cons: Smaller than most butcher block options at 13.5 by 10 inches

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product initially arrived with a crack. However, I decided to use the warranty and quickly received an excellent replacement. The cutting board itself is heavy and sturdy and is used every day! I have had it for two months with no problem, using proper care. I do recommend purchasing a separate cutting board oil, however. Good customer service and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jane G.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if I could. When I received this the wrapping was ripped open and an ENTIRE corner was completely missing. Almost like it was already sent to someone and they sent it back out. Also this is a small cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Erin lynam

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I have a small studio apartment with a galley kitchen and little counter space. This board is nicely constructed and has a weight to it, a bit of heft, that helps keep it stable and keeps it from sliding around on a small counter surface.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cutting board I bought in a while, kind of small but works just great
customer_reviews.author: Devin11

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice thick wood and attractive to leave out on the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than I expected. Overall nice thick wood and attractive to leave out on the counter. You can be the judge on the size. I took a pic with a few of the items in the picture and a standard Hershey bar for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concerned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board in October 2017. It is very good looking and has held up well until now. Tonight I noticed a crack starting at one end. This appears to be where the bamboo strips were joined. This crack can now gather juices that can harbor bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Diane from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: This cutting board lasted a couple of months before starting ...
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board lasted a couple of months before starting to split in multiple areas. I would look into other cutting boards. Update: I decided to improve my rating due to seller's great customer service. I was given a replacement and see they care about my experience. I will reconsider my review in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Jander Yzaguirre

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and showed up wood glued
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made . Showed up with a 2 cracks and one is very large and looks like they used Wood glue.
customer_reviews.author: Erika A

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service. I had to return the first one because of some defects. It was replaced and it is better than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: CB1992

customer_reviews.title: bought this because the reviews were awesome and it is great
customer_reviews.text: bought this because the reviews were awesome and it is great! perfect size and you never see any cut marks. i love it and it is very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara r.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product! After receiving it and using it for a month it literally fell apart. There are pieces of wood that were glued together so after a few uses it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: DevikaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Does get spotted after cutting red meat. Just apply a little olive oil after cleaning and good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Although this looks like a durable product
customer_reviews.text: Although this looks like a durable product, it is not. I just bought this and have only used it a few times and it already cracked in the middle ready to split in half. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marely garcia

customer_reviews.title: Warped and cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have been using this since delivery on Nov 10th. It has warped andnow cracked. I am very careful with it. I had my last cutting board 15 years. I have missed the 30 day return time. I also bought a larger one. I hope that one is ok.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kopp

customer_reviews.title: It is really nicely made, but I failed to recognize it all ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really nicely made, but I failed to recognize it all s a fraction of the size the picture implies.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: broke within 1 week. and it did not get into water. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality , breaks off in a a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: The board started falling off after 2 days. It was barely used , and was definitely not dropped hard or anything that could have cause any damages. The board has multiple rectangular pieces glued together that start separating in a few days. Will not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RobinhoodP

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The board split at a glued seam the first time I used it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Russ M.

customer_reviews.title: Worped and cracked
customer_reviews.text: I have this cutting board for 2 months and is worpe and cracking I hardly ever use it as a cutting board and now I cannot return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but came broken
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a really nice cutting board. Slightly smaller than I though but nice and thick. I recieved mine broken though. Update: The seller contacted me and sent me a new one hassle free. This time the cutting board packed in a size appropriate box. Last time it came in a giant box with multiple item which is most likely what caused the break. I am happy with the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J

customer_reviews.title: will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: I have had cutting boards before nothing special this is the first good one I purchased not at the dollar store. Huge difference. Its strong and sturdy and heavy. we even use it for a meat and cheese plate to serve at parties. I believe this will stand the test of time if taken care of properly. do not submerge in water or put in dishwasher and I recommend using food grade mineral oil once a month to keep it lasting for a long time. I might just buy another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Princessjenny

customer_reviews.title: The customer service is outstanding and I'm glad that I got a replacement board
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it was exactly what I expected. Initially, the board arrived, with a split along the seam (like the glue didn't adhere--probably separated during transit or something). I sent Royal Craft Wood a message and they responded to me right away. They sent me a replacement right away and was in constant contact. The customer service is outstanding and I'm glad that I got a replacement board. From what I could tell, it's well made and I look forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great board. Very durable and thick. I actually ended up using it as a serving platter for a cheese plate the other night when I could not find a large plate and it worked out just fine. The size is perfect and I think it looks much more expensive than it actually did I oil It with mineral oil to make it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Olga DegrootTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This board is perfect, and I have looked for perfect a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a replacement for my old best friend..cutting board. This board is perfect..just a smidgen smaller other one but is fine. Attractive..which is good because it is never put away. Love it. Order process was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chopping board
customer_reviews.text: Best for everyday use. It is a very good size. Great quality, and the juice groove is seriously awesome! Now every time I cut a tomato or watermelon, the groove stops the juice from pouring over the edge. You’re able to use the board on both sides, which is super handy. It’s made of bamboo, so it’d great to cut everything on!! Meat, vegetables.. etc. It’s my go to board! I’m super happy with it. I’ll be purchasing another one for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: ALENA

customer_reviews.title: Less than a month and already split
customer_reviews.text: Had this cutting only about a month and used it once. I washed and dried the board immediately after using it and you can imagine my surprise when I took it out of the cabinet about 3 weeks later and it was already starting to split. I hope I just got a lemon and hope this company honors their warranty and stands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: DavebyNet

customer_reviews.title: Bought but who ever packed did not check. I noticed first things had a solid piece of wood I used 20years so guess I will go bec
customer_reviews.text: Liked weight. Color and bought because it was bamboo how're one was coming apart at first seam. Not worth the money. Actuall definitely not worth it. Don't use because I don't want food in crack and contaminated food so will trash or hubby might find use in shop so money down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good board. Although it dries out faster than others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: splits jn half within a month of use! Even is hand washed and dried inmediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Split after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The board split in places after several months of steady use. It's serviceable, still, but nothing special now that it's cracked.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the board. The handles are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cutting Board!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cutting board. I like the channel around the board, it definitely helps keep the juices contained. I received this item at a discount for an honest review. I would recomeend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Rains

customer_reviews.title: Received Three All Broken
customer_reviews.text: I have now received three of these boards two of which I have paid for. The woman was so nice in her e-mail back to me that I almost did not write this review but I feel everyone should understand that these board will mostly likely come broken to you. The first cutting board I received was broken in 4 places, the second I used once and it is already cracking on three separate places. And then the third board I received to make up for the board that was cracking came broken in half. The company are great people but the product is unfortunately not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey wargo

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board! I use this daily, sometimes multiple times per day. It's useful as well as beautiful, for everything from veggie prep to serving appetizers or a charcuterie tray.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Collins

customer_reviews.title: Holder for Air Fryer to protect countertop.
customer_reviews.text: I like the smaller size of it, actually use it to put my Air Fryer on to protect my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Connie F

customer_reviews.title: Chopping Board
customer_reviews.text: This chopping board is lovely quality! It is super comfortable with its handles, making it super comfortable to carry around everywhere. I use it often to assemble a variety of crackers and cheeses for guests when they come over. My husband also loves to use it when taking meat off the grill. It's large enough to fit a few steaks on there. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size cutting board! Handles cutting and chopping meat easily, doesn’t take much place in my storage shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Nice end grain board
customer_reviews.text: It is not the first product of Royal Craft Wood I’m using. Always good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and without flaws
customer_reviews.text: Simple and without flaws. This board can be used both at home and in a professional kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mcskelly

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first got it. Now 16 days later, it is already cracked. I just used it for chopping veggies. Not much force with a knife. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Update to review
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. One is split about 2 inches. Poor quality control. For a "Premium " product I expected better. Update:: this seller contacted me two or three times to resolve the issue of the board. Just received a replacement. Anyone who stands behind their product like this not only earns my business, but my respect. BUY from this company you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: charles alto foster

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutting board and prompt service!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is a good, solid, heavy duty cutting board. It doesn’t warp, so it lays nice and flat while cutting. The trough around the outside edges is nice, too, because it keeps the juices from getting on my countertop. It is a good product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality was good, and looked quite rich
customer_reviews.text: The board was thick as advertised. The quality was good, and looked quite rich. I added board oil and it shoaked it up very quickly. I plan to use it as my steak plate. It looks like it will be the perfect size and perform as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice butcher block for the price. Does what it’s supposed to. Good size
customer_reviews.author: Penelope A. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Nice find for my own kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a chef at my restaurant. In the kitchen it is very important to have convenient and simple things at hand. A great discount attracted me to the Royal Craft Wood. But it turned out to be a very high-quality product. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C Garrett

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bamboo cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: I always buy bamboo cutting boards, love the look and smell of it. This one is sturdy and still looks good after using it for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice price!!!
customer_reviews.text: A great price for such beauty. I love to bake a chicken and after you can apply it to the Bamboo Wood Cutting Board. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Ian M Fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Pretty house warming gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, arrived as promised, looks beautiful. I didn’t unwrap it since it was a present though.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

product_meta.title: Thick End Grain Bamboo Wood Cutting Board/Kitchen Butcher Block - Heavy Duty Chopping Board With Juice Grooves and Handles. Best for Carving Meat, Fish and Chicken | Perfect Housewarming Gift
